p: NiCo 2O 4/silver doped carbon xerogel composite has not been studied before as supercapacitors electrodes. A published work [ 31] investigated the carbon xerogel with manganese oxide as supercapacitors electrodes in a symmetric and asymmetric configuration. In their study, they found a relation between texture properties of carbon and pore size distribution with the obtained capacitance, and the highest obtained capacitance was 213 F·g −1 for asymmetric configuration.
